# COMMERCIAL BANKING SERVICES AGREEMENT

**Agreement ID:** ZCB/COM/2025/002  
**Effective Date:** 2025-01-15  
**Duration:** 3 years  
**Bank:** ZENITH COMMERCIAL BANK PLC  
**Client:** GlobalTrade Exporters Pvt Ltd  
**Registration:** CIN: U51223MH2018PTC304567

## 1. INTRODUCTION
This Commercial Banking Services Agreement is entered into between ZENITH COMMERCIAL BANK PLC and GlobalTrade Exporters Pvt Ltd. The Bank provides cash management, payment processing, trade finance, and working capital solutions.

## 2. SERVICES
The Bank maintains current accounts with daily statements, offers ACH/RTGS/NEFT/international payments, issues Letters of Credit and Bank Guarantees, and provides online banking with sweep accounts.

## 3. FEES AND CHARGES SCHEDULE

### 3.1 Overview of Banking Services and Associated Costs

The Client acknowledges that Zenith Commercial Bank charges fees for all commercial banking services provided under this Agreement. All fees are in Indian Rupees (INR) and exclusive of GST.

### 3.2 Cash Management Services

The Bank maintains the Client's account(s) with daily statements and monthly reconciliation. For this service, the Client shall pay a monthly fee of 2500 rupees. Additional monthly reconciliation reports are 750 rupees each.

### 3.3 Payment Processing Services

**ACH Processing:** The Bank charges 500 rupees per ACH file and 2.50 rupees per individual transaction. 

**RTGS:** 50 rupees per transaction for amounts exceeding INR 2,00,000.

**NEFT:** 25 rupees per transaction for amounts up to INR 1,00,000. 

**Domestic Wire Transfer:** 80 rupees per transaction. 

**International Wire Transfer (SWIFT):** 700 rupees per transaction covering SWIFT transmission and correspondent bank coordination. Valid until December 31, 2025 only.

**FATCA Compliance Screening:** 90 rupees per transaction for FATCA screening on outbound remittances. 



### 3.4 Trade Finance Services

**Letters of Credit:** LC Issuance costs 15000 rupees per LC (validity up to 180 days).  Amendments cost 5000 rupees each.  Negotiation is 3500 rupees per document set, with discrepancy processing at 2500 rupees per LC.

**Bank Guarantees:** Performance Guarantee Issuance is 12500 rupees per guarantee (one-year tenor).  Bid Bonds are 10000 rupees per guarantee. Financial Guarantees cost 12500 rupees. Amendments are 3000 rupees each.

### 3.5 Online Services and Digital Banking

**Online Portal Access:** Monthly fee of 900 rupees. 

**Sweep Account Management:** 3500 rupees per month. 

**API Integration Setup:** 25000 rupees (one-time). 

**MIS Reports:** 1500 rupees per custom report; weekly cash position 500 rupees per week.

### 3.6 Credit Facility Charges

**Interest Rates:** Cash Credit Facility at Base Rate (8.00%) + 2.50% = 10.50% p.a. Trade Credit at Base Rate + 2.00% = 10.00% p.a.

**Non-Interest Charges:** Annual Facility Review 5000 rupees; Documentation 10000 rupees (one-time); Disbursement 0.25%; Facility Enhancement 3000 rupees per request. 

### 3.7 Fee Invoice and Payment

Fees are calculated monthly and invoiced within 5 business days of month-end. Payment due within 15 days. Late payment interest at 12% p.a. Disputes must be reported within 30 days of invoice.

### 3.8 Annual Fee Escalation

3.5% annual escalation applies.

### 3.9 Minimum Activity Requirement



### 3.10 Volume-Based Discounts

Schedule C volume discounts available.

### 3.11 Amendments to Fee Schedule

The Bank may amend this fee schedule with 30 days' notice. Client requests for fee amendments require Bank approval.


## 4. CREDIT FACILITIES
Cash Credit Facility: INR 25,000,000 at Base Rate (8%) + 2.50% = 10.50% p.a.

## 5. SERVICE LEVELS
99.5% payment processing by next business day. 99.5% online portal uptime.

## 6. REPRESENTATIONS & WARRANTIES
Both parties authorized and comply with applicable laws.

## 7. LIABILITY
Limited to total fees paid in preceding 12 months except for gross negligence.

## 8. CONFIDENTIALITY
Maintain confidentiality for 3 years post-termination.

## 9. TERMINATION & DISPUTES
90 days termination notice. Disputes resolved via escalation, mediation, arbitration.

## 10. AMENDMENTS
May be amended by written agreement. Bank may modify fees with 30 days' notice.

## 11. GENERAL PROVISIONS
Force majeure protection. Counterpart execution by electronic means permitted.
